title: Hurricane Elsa midday update & tropical weather forecast: July 2, 2021
content:
1. Hurricane Elsa midday update & tropical weather forecast: July 2, 2021  FOX 13 Tampa Bay
  2. Elsa strengthens into the season's first hurricane, and could pose a threat to Florida by next week  CNN
  3. The Weather Authority: Occasional showers today; beautiful holiday weekend ahead  Alabama's News Leader
  4. Tropical Storm Elsa is the latest evidence climate change is happening now  Yahoo News
  5. Forecast: Rain chances target inland areas  NBC2 News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
